pages.text: Tier three grace scepter focused on healing and support. Adds the modifiers $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/healers_grace)Healers Grace$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/healers_pact)Healers Pact$(), and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/lesser_enduring)Lesser Enduring$(). Can be augmented with tier three or lower spells. Culmination of the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption.$()$(br2)$(l)Mana:$() 1450
